reviews.text: I've walked past this place more than a few things, and finally decided to try it out for lunch. I got a burger and fries since you can't really go wrong...
Worst customer service I have ever experienced, They refused to let me sit down after I ordered a coffee even though I was the only customer inside the...
Got the breakfast roll 2.0. Can't say it's the best roll I've had but it was certainly not bad. Felt a little too big and oily for my taste but overall it's...
